p: We read with interest the recent report by Lam and colleagues in this Journal, who compared global rates of respiratory viruses (REF)(1). We found that 20 respiratory pathogens circulated in Beijing, China, and influenza virus, human rhinovirus (hRV) and mycoplasma (MP) were the major pathogens. This information needs to be considered by clinicians when treating patients presenting with influenza-like illness (ILI).
